(hint)____ (quest:soul_cores) are random, (quest:generators) and (img:quest_2) alva form a triangle
return to alva, kill zicoatl for (quest:large_soul_core)
(img:waypoint) to areaidc_g3_2_1 ;; infested barrens
insert (quest:large_soul_core) nearby, enter areaidc_g3_2_2 ;; the matlan waterways
find and activate levers throughout the area
after the big lever at the end, (img:portal) to areaidc_g3_town (img:town) ;; ziggurat encampment
follow the stairs (img:3) and talk to (img:quest_2) alva
enter areaidc_g3_8 ;; the drowned city
find and enter (img:checkpoint) areaidc_g3_11 ;; apex of filth
(hint)____ you can skip (img:arena) areaidc_g3_9 if you find it ;; the molten vault
find and kill the_queen_of_filth for (quest:temple_door_idol)
(hint)____ area is a large spiral, move (counter-)clockwise to reach the end
(img:portal) to areaidc_g3_town (img:town) ;; ziggurat encampment
follow the stairs (img:3), enter areaidc_g3_12 ;; temple of kopec
find the (img:arena) stairs in the corners of the areas (triangles)
kill ketzuli,_high_priest_of_the_sun
talk to (img:quest_2) alva, enter areaidc_g3_town (img:town) ;; ziggurat encampment
go through the gateway
follow the path and stairs, enter areaidc_g3_14 ;; utzaal
kill viper_napuatzi, soft-farm for (quest:sacrificial_heart)
(hint)____ she's usually (img:2), (quest:heart) can also be found later on
find and enter (img:checkpoint) areaidc_g3_16 ;; aggorat
(hint)____ usually (img:2) or (img:1) in the remaining zone
find the plaza and the (img:checkpoint), farm for (quest:heart) if needed
find the (quest:dagger) and table, then place the heart and stab it
(hint)____ usually directly (img:0) of the plaza, but you have to go around (img:6)
find and enter (img:checkpoint) areaidc_g3_17 ;; the black chambers
(hint)____ usually (img:7) of the table
find and kill doryiani,_royal_thaumaturge
(hint)____ this zone is a sequence of mazes connected by bridges
(img:portal) to areaidc_g3_town (img:town) ;; ziggurat encampment
talk to (img:quest_2) doryiani to enter areaidg_endgame_town (img:town) ;; ziggurat refuge
talk to (img:quest_2) doryiani
